subject: Masters Golf Tournament
Golf
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy of Northern Ireland grabbed the early lead in the first round of the Masters with a seven-under 65, but Alvaro Quiros of Spain caught him with a late surge.
snippet: Rory McIlroy of Northern Ireland grabbed the early lead in the first round of the Masters with a seven-under 65, but Alvaro Quiros of Spain caught him with a late surge.
